id: Eddie Jones: England head coach should not have to answer to a director of rugby
paragraph:
Eddie Jones has dismissed out of hand the recommendation in a secret report that he and future England head coaches should be answerable to a director of rugby at the Rugby Football Union.Jones described the recommendation, written by Jeff Blackett, the former Professional Game Board chairman and RFU board member, in a wide-ranging report on the future of English rugby, as “the most faulty argument I’ve ever heard in my life”.The Daily Telegraph revealed details of the confidential report, which was only shared with a handful of key figures in the professional game, on Wednesday.
